sentences.en: And he was so lovely. He robbed my breath with his pale beauty. This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.cn: 他太可爱了。他苍白的小样子喜欢得我无法呼吸了。这个金发的小娃娃，温顺而友好，对世界充满了兴趣。

sentences.en: First she scurbbed their faces ( this one is Moppet ).
sentences.cn: 她先给他们擦脸 ( 这是默比特 ).

sentences.en: Miss Moppet ties up her head in a duster, and sits before the fire.
sentences.cn: 毛胚小姐把自己的头绑在一块抹布里, 然后坐在炉火前.

sentences.en: This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.cn: 这个金发的小娃娃，温顺而友好，对世界充满了兴趣。

trans.tran_cn: <非正>（可爱的）小孩，小娃娃，小女孩
